name: Harry V2ray
keywords: xray vmess vless trojan shadowsocks socks tor

AA.description: Beginner users only need to modify the following AUUID and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start deployment
AA.value: If an error occurs, please check the parameter format or try a few more times. Please be sure to fully understand its meaning before using custom parameters.

AUUID.description: UUID serves as the path and account password of each configuration, it is recommended to modify and save properly, the website that can generate UUID: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

CADDYIndexPage.description: After customizing CADDY deployment, click View to display the page, refer to: https://github.com/Lbingyi/HerokuXray/blob/master/etc/CADDYIndexPage.md

CONFIGCADDY.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run CADDY. If you are not familiar with CADDY configuration, please do not modify it.

CONFIGXRAY.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run xray. If you are not familiar with xray configuration, please do not modify it

ParameterSSENCYPT.description: SS encryption method, check the support agreement: https://www.v2fly.org/config/protocols/shadowsocks.html

StoreFiles.description: Customize the network address to read the storage file list
